content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 32-39)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (14.5, 8.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (14.5, 8.0) (status: FULL_OUTPUT)
- Steam engine at (17.5, 8.5) (status: NOT_CONNECTED)
- Small electric poles at (19.5, 9.5) and (17.5, 11.5)
- Partial water pipe connection from offshore pumps

### Secondary Boiler at position (14.5, 11.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (14.5, 11.0) (status: NOT_CONNECTED)
- No steam engine or proper connections

### Oil Processing Complex
Consists of:
- Oil refinery at (15.5, 15.5) (status: NO_POWER, recipe: BasicOilProcessing)
- Pumpjack at (17.5, 40.5) (status: NO_POWER)
- Partial pipe network for crude oil (status: EMPTY)
- Missing power connections throughout

### Chemical Plant Complex at position (6.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Chemical plant (status: NO_POWER, recipe: sulfur)
- Storage tank at (3.5, 12.5)
- Small electric poles at (8.5, 10.5), (8.5, 13.5), and (7.5, 14.5)
- Missing petroleum gas input and power

### Water Pipe Network
Consists of:
- Two offshore pumps at (-9.5, -0.5) and (-9.5, -2.5)
- Extensive pipe network with multiple pipe groups:
  - Working water pipes (status: FULL_OUTPUT)
  - Empty pipe sections (status: EMPTY)

## ERROR TIPS

### Power System Issues
- Multiple steam engines placed but not properly connected to boilers
- Verify boiler-steam engine alignment and spacing requirements
- Ensure all power generation components are properly connected to the grid

### Fluid Connection Problems
- Failed to connect pumpjack to oil refinery due to blocked connection points
- Verify all connection points are clear before attempting connections
- Implement proper pipe routing between distant facilities

### Placement Collisions
- Repeated boiler placement failures due to existing entities or water
- Survey target area thoroughly before placement attempts
- Consider alternative positions when initial placement fails

### Inventory Management
- Attempted to place boiler when none were in inventory
- Track inventory levels before placement attempts
- Implement crafting checks for critical components

### Recipe Configuration
- Oil refinery now has BasicOilProcessing recipe set
- Remember to set recipes before attempting connections
- Verify all required inputs are available for configured recipes

### Entity Positioning
- Multiple steam engine placement attempts failed due to existing pipes
- Clear space before placing large entities
- Consider larger spacing values when placing next to existing structures

### Power Network Expansion
- Chemical plant and oil refinery remain without power
- Extend power network to all production facilities
- Verify power pole coverage and connections

### Fluid System Management
- Some pipe groups remain empty despite connections
- Verify fluid sources are properly connected and powered
- Check for missing connections in long pipe runs
